data.text: @nephro_doctor Sir, we regret the waiting time and inconvenience. We request you to share the PNR and contact number via DM so we may connect with you for assistance.~Vaishali

@shakti3334 Dr Singh, we regret the inconvenience you have experienced. A representative of our team attempted to reach you but was unsuccessful. We want to reassure you that you will receive your money back within 5-7 working days in your account. ~Snigdha
@KhalfeBilal Sir, we regret that you had to wait. Please share your concern with us via DM along with the contact details, we'll help you out. ~Sheetal  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@Vijendra9980535 Mr Singh, please share your transaction details along with the registered mobile number and email address via DM so we may look into it. ~Sheetal  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@meVineeth Sir, please know that fares are dynamic in nature and may increase or decrease at any given time as per the requirement and avilability.~Vaishali
@_Sudipa_B Mr Bhunia, please don't worry. We'll check this with the concerned team and will update you. ~Snigdha

@Lightoftrichy @indigo @TrichyAviation While we always try and maintain an on-time performance, we hope you will understand that sometimes there are certain factors which are beyond our control. We truly hope to serve you  better on future flight. ~Shreya 2/2

@Lightoftrichy @indigo @TrichyAviation Sir, we truly regret the experience you had with us. As per protocols, customers with longer connecting time are made to exit and re-enter the terminal building. And there was a further delay due to the late arrival of incoming flight. 1/2
@AnkitGade1 Sir, please share your contact details with us via DM. Our team will connect with you on this. ~Sheetal  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@mainhnunavivek Sir, what happened? Please share your experience in detail via DM along with the PNR, we'll have a closer look into it. ~Sheetal  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@snjev310 Sir, we regret to see this. Our aircraft undergo deep cleaning on a daily basis and we have defined process to ensure the same.We'll share your feedback with the cleanliness department for review, please DM the PNR.  ~Shreya  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

urls.title: Plan B: flight is cancelled or rescheduled? Worry not - IndiGo
urls.description: If your flight cancelled or changed from our end. We have Plan B for you! Now change or cancel your flight booking & process refunds. Know more at goIndiGo.in

data.text: @tweet_alisksaji Sir, we never wish our passengers to go through any hassle. You may click on plan B link click here https://t.co/2OUXTgJRNo to book alternate flight or cancel at no charge. Thanks! ~Sheetal
@LaxmanS67457180 Mr Singh, we can truly understand your frustration here. Please allow us some time to check and get back to you shortly. ~Sheetal

@roaringrocks Sir, we understand how it feels to wait. We are sending stern feedback with the relevant team for necessary review & action on this. We wish to provide you with better service in the future. ~Sheetal
@_bhaskar_js Sir, please reach out to us via DM and let us know your concern in detail so we may assist you. ~Sheetal  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@RampalliVijay Sir, we'll assist you here. Please share your contact details via DM so we may connect with you. ~Sheetal  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@SamiaObeidd Hi, we would like to get this checked. Please let us know your PNR via DM so we may update you  shortly. ~Sheetal  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@rajat_badala Mr Badala, let us check this and assist you on this. Please allow us some time. ~Snigdha
@iamishanarora Mr Arora, thank you for your understanding. We'll have well noted your feedback. ~Snigdha
@SoumyaLoomba Ms Loomba, we regret to know that our customer care team couldn't be of help. Please DM us the PNR, we'll surely check and assist you. ~Snigdha

data.text: @sanjeevvyas Mr Vyas, we understand waiting is no fun. The flight got delayed due to the late arrival of the incoming flight. The new departure time is 2140 hrs. ~Snigdha
@JimishSanghavi Sir, we regret the experience. Please DM the PNR so we may check. ~Shreya  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@ShreyansOstwal1 Sir, you do not wish to pay for the seat, while doing the web check-in, please click on the 'auto-assign' option which is available till 6 hours prior to the departure and a seat will be assigned to you as per the availability. ~Sheetal

@anurag_somit Sir, we truly understand your concern here and would like to get this checked with our team. Please share the PNR via DM and we'll get back to you shortly with an update. ~Sheetal  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@Jaskaran__Singh Sir, we regret the delay. Please share a suitable time and alternate contact via DM to connect with you.~Shreya
@vjay_rtm We regret the delay, however, we believe our team has contacted and addressed your concern. Thanks! ~Shreya

@moosajattforeva We tried connecting with you on the registered contact number, however, it didn’t go through. Please share a suitable time and alternate contact via DM to connect with you.~Shreya  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@KhadriaHarshay Hi, please share the PNR with us via DM, we'll check & advise. ~Sheetal  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@SchwarzBrudder Sir, we understand your concern.  Given what has already been said to you, we are unable to advise you differently. Look towards your understanding. ~Shreya

@DrAbdulsamad85 Sir, we believe our customer relations team has replied to you via mail. We request you to revert on the same mail with the required details so our team can check and take it forward. We hope for your understanding. ~Shreya
@amit7negi Mr Negi, we are sharing the information with the concerned team right away. Please allow us some time. ~Sheetal

Perfected in our brand-new Food Lab, our breads are fresh to the last bite. Baked and served on the same day, you’ll agree they’re extraordinary. #AiromaticFresh #goIndiGo https://t.co/LcCNmA138A https://t.co/VBZX0vTlZz
@AbhieSays We regret to know this, Mr Gakhar. Please share your contact details with us via DM so we may connect with you in this regard. ~Sheetal  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@PNJoshi_ We are so glad to see the smiling faces here! We wish you a pleasant journey with us. #goIndiGo ~Sheetal
@RaviNakka15 Sir, we will help you with this. Please share the PNR along with the supporting document via DM for us to check and assist ~Sheetal  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

urls.title: Manage Booking: Edit, cancel & reschedule flight - IndiGo
urls.description: Manage your IndiGo flight booking. Select a seat, edit, change, cancel & reschedule your flight. Get your travel itinerary, download ticket or print boarding pass.

data.text: @abhiMysoreTweet Sir, you may change/cancel your flight here: https://t.co/xgObbSkVrJ. If you unable to do the needful, please feel free to reach out to us via DM. ~Sheetal  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@ErHoneybehal Sir, we regret the delay. We tried connecting with you on the registered contact number, however, it didn’t go through. Please share a suitable time and alternate contact via DM to connect with you.~Shreya  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@rahoolchimnani Mr Chimnani, we sincerely regret the experience you had with us. We are getting this checked and will get back to you. Please allow us some time. ~Snigdha

@periwal_keshav Sir, we never wish to disrupt your travel plans. The delay was due to the late arrival of the incoming aircraft which disrupted the rotation of the aircraft. We hope you will understand that many factors are beyond our control that determine our flight schedule. ~Sheetal
@mehtajalpan Mr Mehta, we truly regret the delay and we are informing our team to expedite the process and get in touch with you. ~Sheetal
@jigar_samani Sir, please know that one of our representatives will reach out to you shortly on your registered mobile number. ~Sheetal

@keepkwizing We regret the delay. We tried connecting with you on the registered contact number, however, it didn’t go through. Please share a suitable time and alternate contact via DM to connect with you.~Shreya  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@handleZish Hi, you may write to us via DM for any assistance. ~Snigdha  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@Stardust_EIEM Mr Elangovan, we never wish you and your family to go through any hassle while traveling with us. We're getting this checked with the concerned team to look into it. ~Snigdha  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@KSANJEETSHARMA This shouldn't have happened, Mr Sharma. Could you please DM us the PIR(Property irregularity report) given by our arrival team to look into it? ~Snigdha  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@imchikachirag Mr Mehta, we understand the sweet-bitter experience here. However, we have duly noted the feedback and we wish to serve you with a better experience next time you fly with us. ~Sheetal

urls.title: Pre-Book Excess Baggage: Domestic & International - IndiGo
urls.description: Book pre-paid excess baggage upto 2 hours prior to the scheduled departure of your flight. Checkout extra baggage slabs/ charges at goIndiGo.in website.

data.text: @itsfaisal55 For detailed information related to price, please visit https://t.co/h1g4HYfFo1 for your reference. Let us know if you still have any queries. ~Sheetal

@itsfaisal55 Sir, please know that the domestic flight should be within 48 hours of your international flight or 48 hours, also, excess baggage should be booked at least 6 hours before the scheduled departure.

urls.title: Travel Guidelines: International Arrivals & Departures - IndiGo
urls.description: Mandatory travel guidelines for passengers flying from India to international destinations and back to India. Detailed advisory & requirements at goIndiGo.in

data.text:
@sm_says Sir, please visit https://t.co/Zcu6qrFg8n to check the international travel guidelines. Please feel free to reach out to us via DM. ~Sheetal
  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@wo_dekho Hi, a power bank is allowed to be carried in hand baggage only. ~Shreya
@KOKsTweet Yes, you may club your check-in baggage in case travelling under the same PNR & weight limit should not exceed 32 kgs. Thanks! ~Shreya

domain.name: Business Taxonomy
domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

entity.name: Travel & Transportation Business
entity.description: Brands, companies, advertisers and every non-person handle with the profit intent related to travel as airlines, travel agencies, hotels

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies
domain.description: Interests, opinions, and behaviors of individuals, groups, or cultures; like Speciality Cooking or Theme Parks

entity.description: This entity includes all conversations about travel and vacation.
